mapper.select: select mi.isActive, mi.createTime, mi.content, mi.messageInfoId, mi.contentType, mi.messageType, um.isRead as isRead,um.isDeleted as isDeleted from messageInfo mi INNER JOIN usermessage um on um.messageInfoId=mi.messageInfoId where um.isDeleted=#{isDelete} and um.isRead=#{isRead} and um.userId=#{userId}
